# Kryil Infotech - Technology and Innovation, Simplified

> Kryil Infotech is India's leading defense technology and enterprise software solutions company based in Bangalore, Karnataka. Our tagline: "Technology and Innovation, Simplified"

## About Kryil Infotech
Kryil Infotech Private Limited (also known as Kryil Industries) is a cutting-edge technology company specializing in defense technology, aerospace engineering, and enterprise software development. We serve clients worldwide with innovative solutions in UAV drones, jet engines, autonomous systems, AI/ML, cybersecurity, and full-stack development.

## Our Services

### Defense & Aerospace Technology
- UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle) Development
- Drone Technology & Manufacturing
- Jet Engine Engineering & Propulsion Systems
- Autonomous Systems & Combat Drones
- Surveillance & Reconnaissance Drones
- Avionics & Flight Control Systems
- Defense Electronics & Radar Systems
- Military Grade Software Development
- VTOL Aircraft Development
- Drone Swarm Technology
- Counter UAV & Anti-Drone Systems

### Enterprise Software Development
- Node.js Backend Development
- FastAPI & Python Development
- React.js Frontend Development
- TypeScript & JavaScript Full Stack
- Express.js & NestJS Development
- Django & Flask Development
- MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node)
- REST API & GraphQL Development
- Microservices Architecture
- Serverless Development (Lambda, Cloud Functions)
- Mobile App Development (React Native, Flutter)

### Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps
- AWS (Amazon Web Services)
- Microsoft Azure
- Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
- Kubernetes & Docker Containerization
- CI/CD Pipeline (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
- Terraform & Ansible Automation
- Server Management & Administration
- Cloud Migration Services
- Hybrid & Multi-Cloud Strategy

### AI & Machine Learning
- Artificial Intelligence Solutions
- Deep Learning & Neural Networks
- Computer Vision & Image Recognition
- Natural Language Processing (NLP)
- Chatbot Development
- Predictive Analytics
- Data Science & Big Data Analytics
- Machine Learning Model Development

### Cybersecurity Services
- Penetration Testing
- Vulnerability Assessment
- Security Audits
- Network Security
- SOC (Security Operations Center)
- SIEM Implementation
- Threat Detection & Incident Response
- Ethical Hacking
- Compliance Consulting (ISO 27001, SOC 2, GDPR, HIPAA)

### IoT & Embedded Systems
- Internet of Things Solutions
- Industrial IoT (IIoT)
- Edge Computing
- Embedded Systems Development
- Firmware & RTOS Development
- Sensor Integration
- Smart Home & Smart City Solutions

### Digital Marketing
- Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
- PPC Advertising (Google Ads, Facebook Ads)
- Social Media Marketing
- Content Marketing
- Email Marketing
- Marketing Automation

### Database Administration & Development
- Database Administration (DBA Services)
- Database Development & Design
- Data Warehousing Solutions
- MFBI (Microsoft Fabric Business Intelligence)
- Power BI Development & Reporting
- SQL Server Administration & Development
- Oracle Database Administration
- MySQL & PostgreSQL Administration
- MongoDB & NoSQL Databases
- Database Optimization & Tuning
- ETL Development (SSIS, SSRS, SSAS)
- Data Modeling & Schema Design
- Database Migration Services
- Database Security & Encryption
- Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW)
- Real-time Analytics & OLAP
- 24x7 Remote DBA Support
- Cloud Database (Azure SQL, Amazon RDS, Google Cloud SQL)
